reviewText: Of course this movie is on vhs format and a little grainy but over all a pretty good family film. The reason for buying was for Rugged Gold- I'm a Graham Greene fan and wanted it for my collection.

great family film, i original bought this because both my mother and i loved the movie land of rugged gold.which tells the true story of Martha Martin and her life in alaska. also reccomended her biography O' Land Of Rugged Gold.
